great schools where all students flourish

p.a: School buses will deliver meals daily to outlying LWCS students

li.p:
Lake Wales charter school buses will be rolling again Thursday, April 9 but this time instead of delivering student, they will be delivering food.

a.style: text-indent: -999999px; background: url('https://donate.firstgiving.com/dpa/static/img/donate_button_blue.png') no-repeat; width: 188px; height: 44px; display: block;

a.title:
Schools are closed until April 15th. Please visit your school website for school specific messages.

Schools are closed until April 15th. Please visit your school website (bottom of our page under Our Schools) for school specific updated information and messages regarding your school. We will continue to provide updates to the website and facebook as we receive them. Thanks.

div.p: Pursuant to Florida Statute §119.12 (2) the contact information for The Lake Wales Charter School's custodian of public records can be reached at:

Primary Address where records are routinely created, sent, received, maintained and requested:
130 E. Central Avenue
Lake Wales, FL 33853

li.a: Dale R. Fair Babson Park Elementary
